/*
** D3   battery charging (charging = LOW)
** D4   backlight (analog)
** D6   SPI Display DC
** D7   SPI Display Reset
** D8   SPI Display SCLK
** D9   SPI Display MOSI (Make sure this is set for GPIO, not NFC)
** D14  SPI Display CS
** D15  I2C SDA (SC7A20)
** D16  I2C SCK (SC7A20)
** D17  SPI Flash MOSI
** D18  SPI Flash SCLK
** D19  SPI FLash MISO
** D20  SPI Flash CS
** D22  buzzer
** D25  BTN1 (input_pullup)
** D26  BTN2 (input_pullup)
** D28  I2C SDA (0x48 - HRM??)
** D29  I2C SCK (???)
** D30  analog battery voltage (low = 2.555, high = 3.17)
*/

0x50000500: 00000000 3015ecc0 3015ecc0 3015ecc0 860a1008 3057eff0 3057eff0 3057eff0 
0x50000520: 00001000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x50000540: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x50000560: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x50000580: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x500005a0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x500005c0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x500005e0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x50000600: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 
0x50000620: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 
0x50000640: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 
0x50000660: 00000000 00000001 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 
0x50000680: 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000001 
0x500006a0: 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x500006c0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000 
0x500006e0: 00000001 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 
0x50000700: 00000002 00000002 00000002 00000000 00000003 00000003 00000003 00000003 
0x50000720: 00000001 00000003 00000003 00000003 0003000c 00000003 00000003 00000003 
0x50000740: 00000003 00000003 00000003 0000000c 00000003 00000002 00000003 00000002 
0x50000760: 00000002 0003000c 0003000c 00000002 00000003 00000003 00000002 00000000 

0700:  D0  D1  D2  D3  D4  D5  D6  D7
        I   I.  I.  I.  O.  O.  O   O
0720:  D8  D9 D10 D11 D12 D13 D14 D15
        O.  O.  O.  O IPS.  O.  O.  O
0740: D16 D17 D18 D19 D20 D21 D22 D23
        O.  O.  O. IP.  O   I.  O.  I
0760: D24 D25 D26 D27 D28 D29 D30 D31
        I IPS IPS   I.  O.  O   I.  I

0,2 = Input
1,3 = Output
c = input pullup
3000c = input pullup w sense 

GPIO States:
33222222 22221111 11111100 00000000
10987654 32109876 54321098 76543210
________ ________ ________ ________
00110000 01010111 11101111 11110000 =>  DIRECTION (0=in, 1=out)
00110000 00010101 11101100 11000000 =>  OUT (OUTSET,OUTCLR). (0 = pin driver low, 1 = pin driver high)
10000110 00001010 00010000 00001000 =>  INPUT (0 = pin input low, 1 = pin input high)

SPI0: enabled SCK=18 MOSI=17 MISO=19 (SPI Flash)
0x40003500: 00000007 00000000 00000012 00000011 00000013 ffffffff 00000000 000000b9 
0x40003520: 00000000 80000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40003540: 00000000 2000ca50 00000001 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000002 00000000 
0x40003560: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40003580: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000 
0x400035a0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400035c0: 000000ff 00000001 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 

SPI1: (looks unused)
0x40004500: 00000000 00000000 ffffffff ffffffff ffffffff ffffffff 00000000 00000000 
0x40004520: 00000000 04000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40004540: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000002 00000000

0x40004580: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000001 00000000 00000000 
0x400045a0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x400045c0: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 

SPI2:  enabled SCK=8 MOSI=0 MISO=-1 (no MISO, so display)
0x40023500: 00000007 00000000 00000008 00000009 ffffffff ffffffff 00000000 00000000 
0x40023520: 00000000 80000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 
0x40023540: 00000000 2000d363 00000069 00000069 00000000 00000000 00000002 00000000
